snippet: The following letter from Gov. HUT was written in reply to an invitation to attend the Railroad Jubilee at Boston: ALBANY, Sept. 8, 1851. GENTLEMEN: I have had the honor to receive your letter, requesting me to unit with the municipal authorities ...
lead_paragraph: The following letter from Gov. HUT was written in reply to an invitation to attend the Railroad Jubilee at Boston: ALBANY, Sept. 8, 1851. GENTLEMEN: I have had the honor to receive your letter, requesting me to unit with the municipal authorities of your city, in celebrating " the completion of the various lines of railway which connect Canada and the great West with the tide waters at Boston."
abstract: Letter replying to invite of Boston Jubilee
